official_title: To amend the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935 to permit registered companies and their subsidiaries to engage in energy conservation and load management services, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935 to permit registered companies and their subsidiaries to engage in energy conservation and load management services.
